results.name: Manhattan distance of n in array A246278 from the top left corner: a(1) = 0; for n>1: a(n) = A055396(n) + A246277(n) - 1.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
example: a(2) = 1, because 2 sits nearest to the top-left corner of the array A246278.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 03 2015
